questions.question: Which of the following best describes the AWS Shared Responsibility Model?

options.A: AWS is responsible for both security of the cloud and security in the cloud.
options.B: AWS is responsible for security in the cloud while the customer is responsible for security of the cloud.
options.C: AWS is responsible for security of the cloud while the customer is responsible for security in the cloud.
options.D: AWS is not responsible for any security aspects.

questions.question: Which AWS service is primarily used for scalable object storage?
Which AWS service is best suited for serverless computing?
Which AWS service is used for a managed relational database solution?
What is a key benefit of using Amazon CloudFront?

options.B: It is a content delivery network (CDN) that reduces latency.
options.C: It is a database service for large data sets.
options.D: It monitors application performance in real time.

questions.question: Which AWS service helps automate resource scaling based on demand?
Which AWS service is a managed NoSQL database?
Which AWS service provides a platform for running containerized applications?
Which service is used to monitor AWS resources and applications in real time?
What does the term "elasticity" refer to in cloud computing?

options.A: The ability to scale resources up or down as needed.
options.B: The ability to store unlimited amounts of data.
options.C: The ability to secure applications from vulnerabilities.
options.D: The ability to monitor application performance continuously.

questions.question: Which AWS service provides a managed data warehousing solution?
Which AWS service allows you to deploy infrastructure as code?
What is one of the main benefits of using AWS Lambda?

options.A: No need to provision or manage servers.
options.C: You only pay for the compute time you consume.

questions.question: Which service helps you secure and manage user access to AWS resources?
Which AWS service is best suited for long-term archival of data at a lower cost?
Which AWS service is used to manage and govern multiple AWS accounts centrally?
Which AWS service would you use to analyze large volumes of streaming data?
What does AWS CloudTrail enable you to do?

options.B: Track user activity and API usage.

questions.question: Which of the following describes a key aspect of high availability in AWS architectures?

options.A: Deploying resources in a single Availability Zone.
options.B: Deploying resources across multiple Availability Zones.
options.C: Using a single server to minimize cost.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the AWS Well-Architected Framework?

options.A: To help build secure, high-performing, resilient, and efficient infrastructure.
options.D: To offer cloud-based file storage solutions.

questions.question: Which AWS service automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple targets?
Which AWS pricing model allows you to pay for compute resources on a per-second basis?
Which AWS service is designed for deploying and managing virtual servers in the cloud?
Which AWS service is used for building continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines?
What is one of the key benefits of the pay-as-you-go pricing model in AWS?

options.A: You must commit to long-term contracts.
options.B: You only pay for the services you actually use.
options.C: You pay a fixed monthly fee regardless of usage.
options.D: It eliminates the need for resource scaling.
